languages.text: Посоветовал{mf||а} Соломону уничтожить больше мирного населения на Райкаде Минорис, чтобы насадить среди выживших ужас и покорность.
Advised Solomorne to destroy more of Rykad Minoris's population in order to instil terror and obedience among the survivors.
languages.original_text: Посоветовал{mf||а} Соломону уничтожить больше мирного населения на Райкаде Минорис, чтобы насадить среди выживших ужас и покорность.

traits.locale_text: Recommended Solomorne to destroy more of Rykad Minoris's population in order to instil terror and obedience among the survivors.
Recommended Solomorne to destroy more of Rykad Minoris's population in order to instil terror and obedience among the survivors.
Advised Solomorne to destroy more of Rykad Minoris's population in order to instil terror and obedience among the survivors.

Advised Solomorne to destroy more of Rykad Minoris's population in order to instil terror and obedience among the survivors.

languages.text: Solomorne angewiesen, mehr Bewohner von Rykad Minoris zu töten, um unter den Überlebenden Angst zu schüren und sie zum Gehorsam zu bewegen.
languages.original_text: Advised Solomorne to destroy more of Rykad Minoris's population in order to instil terror and obedience among the survivors.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne angewiesen, mehr Bewohner von Rykad Minoris zu töten, um unter den Überlebenden Angst zu schüren und sie zum Gehorsam zu bewegen.

languages.text: Vous avez conseillé à Solomorne de faire un nouveau carnage dans la population de Rykad Minoris pour instiller la terreur et l'obéissance dans le cœur des survivants.
languages.original_text: Advised Solomorne to destroy more of Rykad Minoris's population in order to instil terror and obedience among the survivors.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez conseillé à Solomorne de faire un nouveau carnage dans la population de Rykad Minoris pour instiller la terreur et l'obéissance dans le cœur des survivants.

languages.text: Aconsejaste a Solomorne que exterminase a una parte de la población de Rykad Minoris para sembrar el pánico e infundir obediencia entre los supervivientes.
languages.original_text: Advised Solomorne to destroy more of Rykad Minoris's population in order to instil terror and obedience among the survivors.

traits.locale_text: Aconsejaste a Solomorne que exterminase a una parte de la población de Rykad Minoris para sembrar el pánico e infundir obediencia entre los supervivientes.

languages.text: 你建议索罗蒙杀害更多小莱卡德的平民，以便在幸存者中灌输恐惧与服从。
languages.original_text: Advised Solomorne to destroy more of Rykad Minoris's population in order to instil terror and obedience among the survivors.

traits.locale_text: 你建议索罗蒙杀害更多小莱卡德的平民，以便在幸存者中灌输恐惧与服从。

languages.text: 生き残った者たちに恐怖と服従を植え付けるため、さらに多くのライカド・ミノリスの住民を殲滅するようソロモーンに進言した。
languages.original_text: Advised Solomorne to destroy more of Rykad Minoris's population in order to instil terror and obedience among the survivors.

traits.locale_text: 生き残った者たちに恐怖と服従を植え付けるため、さらに多くのライカド・ミノリスの住民を殲滅するようソロモーンに進言した。

languages.text: Solomorne'a, hayatta kalanlara korku aşılayıp itaat duygusunu pekiştirmek için Rykad Minoris nüfusunun daha fazlasını ortadan kaldırmasını tavsiye ettin.
languages.original_text: Advised Solomorne to destroy more of Rykad Minoris's population in order to instil terror and obedience among the survivors.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne'a, hayatta kalanlara korku aşılayıp itaat duygusunu pekiştirmek için Rykad Minoris nüfusunun daha fazlasını ortadan kaldırmasını tavsiye ettin.
